modifier.name: public
modifier.desc: The member or type is fully accessible.

modifier.name: internal
modifier.desc: The member or type is accessible from within its assembly

modifier.name: private
modifier.desc: The member or type is only accessible from within the enclosing type

modifier.name: protected
modifier.desc: The member or type is only accessible from within the enclosing class or a class that inherits from the enclosing class

modifier.name: protected internal
modifier.desc: The member or type is only accessible from within the enclosing class or a class that inherits from the enclosing class or from within its assembly
